label: 御教書
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: A standard documentary form for directives or communiques with short-term effect. Issued from a higher to a lower authority, e.g. from the Bakufu to a shugo. A letter of instruction." [守護]　[Cf. Mass, 1982.]"
